data.event: The Post Office opened on 21 May 1856 as Schnapper Point and was renamed Mornington in 1864.
The Post Office opened on 21 May 1856 as Schnapper Point and was renamed Mornington in 1864.
An earthquake measuring 4.5 on the Richter magnitude scale struck the town on 2 September 1932 associated with the nearby Selwyn fault.

event.title: holds a market day in the main street every Wednesday

data.event: It holds several annual festivals, and holds a market day in the main street every Wednesday, which attracts hundreds of people.
